definitions.body: (servant of (god) Edom, cf. [[עבד אדם]] CIS:No. 295; Dr:Sm 206, 298 and reff., RS:Sem i. 43; 2nd ed. 42 and reff., HPS:2Sa 6:10; but Bae:Rel 10 servant of man, [[אֱדׂם]] = [[אָדָם]], which is thought possible by Nö:ZMG xlii (1888), 470 Buhl:Edomiter 49);—
the Gittite who harboured the ark 2Sa 6:10, 2Sa 6:11, 2Sa 6:11, 2Sa 6:12, 2Sa 6:12 = 1Ch 13:13, 1Ch 13:14, 1Ch 13:14, 1Ch 15:25; LXX Abeddara, LXXL Abeddadan.

?) one of the chief Levitical singers and doorkeepers 1Ch 15:18, 1Ch 15:21, 1Ch 15:24, 1Ch 16:5, 1Ch 16:38, 1Ch 16:38, 1Ch 26:4, 1Ch 26:8, 1Ch 26:8, 1Ch 26:15; LXX Abaedwm, Abdedwm, etc., LXXL Abeddom.
the family of the same 2Ch 25:24 (not in ‖ 2Ki 14:14).
